name: Show Sim Info
description: View all of the internal data for particular sims with an interaction. Originally by Itasan on MTS.

pages.title: Details
pages.html:
What does this mod do?

It allows you to view the internal data associated with your sims.

For screenshots and more in-depth details, please visit the original page by Itasan on MTS.

Why is this mod on this website?

Show Sim Info broke after the July 26, 2022 patch for the High School Years pack, and its original creator, Itasan, no longer updates it. This is a very important mod for many modders and players, so I fixed it myself and wanted to share it with others.

Potential issues

These issues have been reported to me, but I am unable to reproduce them in my latest version. Please ensure you have deleted Ita's version of this mod (the one from Mod The Sims), and if you experience these issues or any others with my version, let me know.

  • Career information does not display for retired sims
  • Relationships are not being filtered correctly

    • It only filters by gender, ignoring relationships


To Itasan: I assumed that you would be alright with someone else maintaining your mod because you have not been active in a couple of years. If this is not the case, please reach out to me and I will remove it from my website.

pages.title: Changelog
pages.html:
3.8.4 (March 18, 2023)

  • Add compatibility with infants
  • Add compatibility for missing occult types (mermaid, werewolf, spellcaster, and plant sims)
  • Add compatibility for missing species (fox)

3.8.3 (August 7, 2022)

  • Fix issues with displaying age & career data
  • Fix issues with using cheats
  • Fix issues with outputting to text file

3.8.2 (July 27, 2022)

  • Adopt this mod from Itasan
  • Fix issue from the High School Years patch (the "This Sim" interaction)
